mapper.update: update lg_transferstation set stationName = #{stationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where transferStationId = #{transferstationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select transferStationId, stationName, longitude, latitude, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_transferstation
